about_the_game:
Story


Charlie, acquired a gleaming object from the flea market and aspired to use it as a bedside lamp in his room. However, he was unaware that this object possessed a powerful time-bending capability. One day, without warning, the overloaded Core instantly transported Charlie to the center of an event in a different time frame within the universe, making him the main character. Charlie's only hope to return to his own time was to recharge Core with energy once again.

Game Play


Charlie must battle the dangers of the ocean to return from the time he's stranded to his own time and paddle to more than 3 islands. On each island, he should overcome its obstacles to collect fuse capsules. In this way, he will be able to refill the charm with energy and return to his own time. You should help him overcome these obstacles in this adventure.

features


  • > 40m play time
  • Explore islands
  • More than 5 challenges for you to overcome.
  • Row the boat.
  • Fun combat
  • Mini craft system
  • Includes mini story
